name: Aquari Hotel

reviews.text: Stayed here mid April. Stayed on 4th floor in a twin room. The room did not have a view but it was great value. The breakfast was good and the hotel was nice and clean. Free wifi in the rooms worked great.
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.text: The location was really good. About a 10 minute walk to Ben Thanh Market.
reviews.title: Great 3* Hotel

reviews.text: Hotel is located in District 1, within walking distance to most of tourist sites and places to eat. Room was clean, modern and spacious with great views of the river.

reviews.text: Breakfast was a little disappointing. While they had a variety of options, they do not seem to re-fill the food (like most other hotels). We usually got down at 9am for breakfast and most of the food and juices would have finished by the time we got there.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff are very friendly, helpful and always smiling. Thoroughly recommended and we will definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Quite new hotel with modern amenities. Property is well located and some rooms such as ours had views of the river. Close to good restaurant areas and downtown activities. Area surrounding hotel is destined for rebuilding which will eventually make this a much better location.
reviews.title: Well located

reviews.text: This is a satisfactory hotel. The room is clean, has a reasonable view and decent facilities. In Australia this would be a 2 star hotel but ticks all the boxes for a Ho Chi Minh stop over. Close to attractions and great restaurants. Breakfast is a bit ordinary compared to other Vietnam breakfasts and don't bother with the coffee.

description: Aquari Hotel will welcome you to a world of luxury. Downtown Saigon with its myriad of attractions such as Opera House, Notre Dame Cathedral Basilica, Reunification Palace, History Museum, Ben Thanh Market is just 10 minutes walking. Saigon, with its quiet temples and parks, live night-entertainment places, is one of the most dynamic and comfortable cities, like Aquari Hotel, strikes the right balance between business and leisure. You will enjoy the convenient location of Little Japan, which is a quiet and safe area at the centre of Ho Chi Minh City.At our core value, we proudly offer the best, most personalized service for business travellers with comprehensive business facilities available in luxurious settings. We include business essentials in every room and provide meeting rooms up to 100 pax with all audio-visual and technological needs as well as catering services for longer meetings. The 90-room Aquari Hotel is designed to deliver a restful stay for business travellers. Many rooms have views to Saigon River so you can enjoy Saigon by night with a panoramic view. The nocturne of riverbank is very romantic for honeymooners. Imagine seeing the sunrise or sunset with a glass of wine after a hard-working or travelling day. How relaxing it is! Innovative design elements are featured in all aspects of the room as well as flexible workspaces with high-speed internet access...The Spring Restaurant offers International and Asian cuisines, along with some of the finest coffee and a variety of specialty teas, wine collection, fresh juices, house cocktails, sandwiches and snacks... The Coffee Corner will introduce you to famous Vietnamese coffees and diversified Western coffees. Refresh yourself with our soothing foot massage, body massage, sauna, steam room, and manicure/ pedicure... provided by highly trained specialists. Whether you stay at the hotel for business or leisure, it's a delightful way to wind down at the end of the day, or anytime! STAY WITH US, FEEL LIKE HOME!
